item.title: Science works best when it is open - World Economic Forum
item.description:
Science works best when it is open - World Economic Forum

Science works best when it is open. The sharing of research results, the free circulation of knowledge, and transparency in methodology are key tenets to the scientific method. This openness makes science a natural environment for collaboration. By pooling together resources, brainpower and complementary expertise, collaborative research ensures that global societal challenges can be tackled.
